HOME.TAGLINE: Discover educational resources from higher education
KEYWORDS: a wide range of resource types and subjects

FEATURE_1.TITLE: Include more educational resources
FEATURE_1.DESCRIPTION: Integrate further educational resources into the index and make them searchable via the central OERSI search.

FEATURE_2.TITLE: Integrate the search into your site or app
FEATURE_2.DESCRIPTION: OERSI's open API enables easy integration of the search into any website or application. Use the provided plugins or develop your own solution directly via the API.

META.DESCRIPTION: The Open Educational Resources Search Index (OERSI) provides a central point for searching for open educational resources in higher education by bringing together the content of distributed OER repositories and other sources of open educational resources.
META.TITLE: Open Educational Resources Search Index
